data.title: Property & Liability Resource Bureau
data.text:
Residential Building Code

Georgia adopted a statewide mandatory residential code that will control. Authority for local amendments will be limited.See PLRB, Georgia Building Codes for more information on state level codes.

Harlem adopted a code that is yet to be identified .Please contact PLRB if you would like us to research this for you.

Auto Search - beta:

2018 IRC with Georgia Amendments (2018 IRC)(Harlem, GA Sec. 108-33.1. - Tiny Home Residential Zone (TNY-R Zone).)

...Single-family dwellings constructed as tiny homes or larger homes of less than 800 square feet in heated area constructed per Appendix S of the International Residential Code as adopted and amended by the Georgia Department of Community Affairs; (2)...
